name: waterHeatingTemperature_setValue
description: This function is used to set the hot water temperature of a boiler's hot water function to a specific value.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the hot water temperature.

parameters.name: waterHeatingTemperature
parameters.description: The specific value to set the hot water temperature to.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterHeatingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the temperature value (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
